content:
Summary:

4K Earth Science Private Limited (4KES) has been contracted by “AERA Group” to undertake verification and certification for the greenhouse gas (GHG) emission reductions reported from ‘Soubré Hydropower Project’ for the monitoring period 01/07/2022 - 30/06/2023 in the initial monitoring report version 1.0 date 05/10/2023.

Soubré Hydro Power Plant (hereafter referred to as “Soubré HPP”) is a greenfield project located about 5 km from Soubré village on the river Sassandra, San Pedro Province, Bas Sassandra region, Céte d’lvoire. The geographical coordinates of the project extension limits are 5°48'33" W, 6°39'28" S (Northernmost point of the dam) and 5°46'56" W, 6°36'55" S (Easternmost point) which has been verified from the Location finder /08/.

The project activity is composed of a run-of-river hydropower plant with a capacity of 270 MW anda micro-hydro power plant of 5.35 MW generating capacity with a total estimated average gross electricity generation of 1,170 GWh per year, fed by a 17.3 km? reservoir. The plant is connected via three 225 kV transmission lines to the national grid: the transmission line Soubré-Buyo, Soubré-San Pedro and Soubré-Taabo. The technical specification of the turbines/alternators and the installed capacity of the project activity has been verified during the remote interview/physical site visit and also from the photos of the Turbines/alternators /09/.
